code: var frozens=new WeakSet();function freezeState(state){if(!frozens.has(state)){Object.keys(state).forEach(function(k){var val=state[k];if(val&&typeof val==="object"){state[k]=freezeState(val);}});Object.freeze(state);frozens.add(state);}return state;}export function freezeReducer(reduce){return function(state,action){var nextState=reduce(state,action);return freezeState(nextState);};}
